mapper.select: SELECT i_User_ID as "iUserId" , i_User_Name as "iUserName" , i_User_Mail as "iUserMail" , i_User_Pass as "iUserPass" , i_User_RoleID as "iUserRoleid" , i_User_SaleID as "iUserSaleid" , i_User_SaleCompanyID as "iUserSalecompanyid" , i_User_CompanyID as "iUserCompanyid" , i_User_CompanyRoleID as "iUserCompanyroleid" , i_User_CustomCompanys as "iUserCustomcompanys" , i_User_ClassID as "iUserClassid" , i_User_TypeID as "iUserTypeid" , i_User_NickName as "iUserNickname" , i_User_RealName as "iUserRealname" , i_User_Sex as "iUserSex" , i_User_QQ as "iUserQq" , i_User_Tel as "iUserTel" , i_User_Add as "iUserAdd" , i_User_Birthday as "iUserBirthday" , i_User_Profession as "iUserProfession" , i_User_Face as "iUserFace" , i_User_About as "iUserAbout" , i_User_Faction as "iUserFaction" , i_User_Invest as "iUserInvest" , i_User_Era as "iUserEra" , i_User_Label as "iUserLabel" , i_User_Tags as "iUserTags" , i_User_Score as "iUserScore" , i_User_Money as "iUserMoney" , i_User_LiveNess as "iUserLiveness" , i_User_ViewNum as "iUserViewnum" , i_User_RegTime as "iUserRegtime" , i_User_LastLoginTime as "iUserLastlogintime" , i_User_LoginIP as "iUserLoginip" , i_User_IsLock as "iUserIslock" , i_User_MailValid_Key as "iUserMailvalidKey" , i_User_MailValid as "iUserMailvalid" , i_User_Question as "iUserQuestion" , i_User_Answer as "iUserAnswer" , i_User_OpenID as "iUserOpenid" , i_User_UCID as "iUserUcid" , i_User_IsRobot as "iUserIsrobot" , i_User_RedBagNum as "iUserRedbagnum" , i_User_IncomeNum as "iUserIncomenum" , i_User_RoomID as "iUserRoomid" FROM i_User_Info WHERE i_User_ID=#{iUserId}
SELECT Auto_increment FROM information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE Table_Schema='${dbName}' AND table_name = 'i_User_Info'

SELECT i_User_ID as "iUserId" , i_User_Name as "iUserName" , i_User_Mail as "iUserMail" , i_User_Pass as "iUserPass" , i_User_RoleID as "iUserRoleid" , i_User_SaleID as "iUserSaleid" , i_User_SaleCompanyID as "iUserSalecompanyid" , i_User_CompanyID as "iUserCompanyid" , i_User_CompanyRoleID as "iUserCompanyroleid" , i_User_CustomCompanys as "iUserCustomcompanys" , i_User_ClassID as "iUserClassid" , i_User_TypeID as "iUserTypeid" , i_User_NickName as "iUserNickname" , i_User_RealName as "iUserRealname" , i_User_Sex as "iUserSex" , i_User_QQ as "iUserQq" , i_User_Tel as "iUserTel" , i_User_Add as "iUserAdd" , i_User_Birthday as "iUserBirthday" , i_User_Profession as "iUserProfession" , i_User_Face as "iUserFace" , i_User_About as "iUserAbout" , i_User_Faction as "iUserFaction" , i_User_Invest as "iUserInvest" , i_User_Era as "iUserEra" , i_User_Label as "iUserLabel" , i_User_Tags as "iUserTags" , i_User_Score as "iUserScore" , i_User_Money as "iUserMoney" , i_User_LiveNess as "iUserLiveness" , i_User_ViewNum as "iUserViewnum" , i_User_RegTime as "iUserRegtime" , i_User_LastLoginTime as "iUserLastlogintime" , i_User_LoginIP as "iUserLoginip" , i_User_IsLock as "iUserIslock" , i_User_MailValid_Key as "iUserMailvalidKey" , i_User_MailValid as "iUserMailvalid" , i_User_Question as "iUserQuestion" , i_User_Answer as "iUserAnswer" , i_User_OpenID as "iUserOpenid" , i_User_UCID as "iUserUcid" , i_User_IsRobot as "iUserIsrobot" , i_User_RedBagNum as "iUserRedbagnum" , i_User_IncomeNum as "iUserIncomenum" , i_User_RoomID as "iUserRoomid" FROM i_User_Info WHERE 1=1 and i_User_ID > #{_parameter}order by i_User_ID
